meaningMnemonic: At <kanji>one</kanji> moment it happened <kanji>simultaneous</kanji>ly. It was <vocabulary>simultaneous</vocabulary>. It was <vocabulary>all at once</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Watch out for the shortening of 一.
